text: (Don't forget to send the final email draft to Mr Yamamoto for tonight.)
(I'll grab a snack at the convenience store before I head home.)
(Did I forward the correct documents to the team after the meeting?)
(I'll check when I get home.)
(Oh dear, how long have I had this song on repeat?)
*It's been playing over 5 times on repeat now*
(That’s odd. I swear I left the train station at 11)
(Why is it taking so long to get home)
(Wait...)
(When was the last time we even stopped?)
(I thought the train track wasn't even supposed to be this long)
Press SPACE to continue
(We're completely out of the city now..)
(How on earth? My phone doesn't have any signal anymore!)
(It's been an hour already! Why haven't we stopped?)
(Everyone seems to be asleep on the train)
(What do I do?!)
*Train is now approaching Kisaragi Station*
(Kisaragi station? Huh?)
*I've never heard of that station in my life)
(I swear the station doesn’t even exist.)
(What's going on?...)
(Did I go too far?)
(I better get out of the train, there’s no way I'm on the right train.)
*Train Stops*
(All the passengers are asleep...)
(In fact, all of the passengers on the train are asleep.)
(It is quite late after all)
(I hope they don’t miss their train stop)
